text:
@DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump Yes and it’s fair.  Unless u have a time machine or parallel universe ready to go, you’ll never be able to tell just how much/or little a concomitant COVID-19 infx (OR tx for infx..) contributed to someone’s demise...

Similar thing often applies to “Natural Disaster” times.
